name: Aero Flyer Institute
about: Aero Flyer Institute is a renowned pilot training institution in Indonesia, located at Budiarto Airport in Curug-Tangerang and Cakrabhuwana Airport in Cirebon-West Java. We are dedicated to providing comprehensive and professional pilot training programs, utilizing advanced technology and latest learning facilities, including Cessna 172P, Cessna 172S, Piper Seneca II, Red Bird FMX, and Frasca 142 simulators. Our modern classrooms and extensive training resources are designed to support your education. With strong connections to Indonesiaâ€™s top airlines and corporate flight departments, our Career Development Department helps you secure a successful career. Our goal is to train you to become one of the most professional pilots in the industry, ensuring you have the best possible start to your aviation career.
